title: Homemade Presents Biscuits & Jam: Mickey Guyton’s History-Making Year
description:
While we are busy recording new episodes of Homemade, check out this episode of Biscuits & Jam. Sid Evans, Editor-in-Chief of Southern Living Magazine, talks to Mickey Guyton about her journey from struggling musician to being the first Black woman to perform solo on the ACM’s. Plus her grandmother’s cornbread and how she first met one of her heroes, Dolly Parton.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Allrecipes
